data.persona: I am the queen of this kingdom.  I am the second wife of the king.  He is often off at battle.  I am left to rule alone.
data.description:
You are in the Confessional.
The room is a small box, composed of sharply cut stone. The room is uncomfortably small, and filled with a lingering scent of something unfamiliar to the occupants.
There's a candle, an incense burner, and an a hanging religious carving here.
The bishop and the king are here.

You are carrying a Books, and wearing a dress.

data.short_motivation: I need to give the books to the bishop so the bishop can read the books.
data.mid_motivation: I need to meet with the bishop to discuss our plans on how to get the common people to support the war.
data.long_motivation: I will be working with my husband so that we can drum up more support for the war.
